input.job_description:
Aabeer Suhail
Bukhari 
International Business
Development Manager 
Conﬁdent, creative and highly proﬁcient
business professional adept in foreign market
entry, expansion and product launch in new
territories. 
aabeerbukhar.as@gmail.com 
+92 321 4334769 
Lahore, Pakistan 
linkedin.com/in/aabeer-suhail-bukhari-
5b723019b 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Business Development Manager 
Wrangler Instruments 
06/2020 - Present
, 
 
Lahore, Pakistan 
Manufacturer & Exporter of Surgical Instruments to EU & USA with an annual sales of $6m 
Secured the largest (by value of money) Purchase Order to date by a new
client based in Copenhagen, Denmark. (Initial value of 180,000 USD. The
accumulate client purchase by far this year is approximately $1M) 
Successfully planned, negotiated and won a contract with UNICEF Supply
Division (03 year exclusive contract worth $1.5M per annum) 
Increased the Revenue by 28% with an existing Key Account by heading a
project of oAering a new product (Market Regulations, Price break ups,
Forecasting, Packaging, Delivery). 
Organized and attended meetings with existing key accounts 
& set up new
meetings with potential customers, travelled to 5+ EU Countries on a 02
week successful business trip representing the company. 
Represented the company at an exhibition in the UAE, while also
negotiating contracts with potential clients in the UAE. 
Expanded the BD Department to a team of 03 Business Development
ODcers targeting diAerent market segments. 
Developed and implemented Market Entry Strategy for the 
Non-proﬁt
sector and marketing and sales plan for the OEM Sector for the year 2021-
2022. 
Deﬁned the Customer Acquisition Process along with Customer Persona
(most proﬁtable) for organization by utilizing extensive market research
and competitive analysis. 
Formulated SOPs as per Shareholder policies for the Business
Development Department. 
Worked with Regulatory Consultants to successfully ensure our products
can access new markets in EU (Swiss Rep, UKCA Compliance) while also
heading projects for new regulations updating. 
Business Development Executive 
Wrangler Instruments 
01/2020 - 06/2020
, 
 
Expanded the clientage of the department by addition of 08 new long
term, sustainable and diverse customer partnerships from Portugal,
United Kingdom, Belgium, Mongolia, Bangladesh, etc. 
International Marketing Executive 
Thermosole Industries Pvt. Ltd. 
03/2019 - 11/2019
, 
 
Under the hood automobile aftermarket parts manufacturer & exporters to the EU 
Single handedly drove 33% increase in international sales. 
Diversiﬁed clientage by securing 3 new international clients from Spain &
Italy. 
EDUCATION 
Bachelors of Chemical Engineering 
COMSATS University, Lahore / Lancaster University,
United Kingdom 
09/2014 - 06/2018
, 
 
CERTIFICATES 
Key Account Management, Breakthrough
Strategies for Growing Valued Customer
- Rausing Executive Development Centre,
LUMS
 (07/2021 - 08/2021)
 
Employer Sponsored Corporate Training 
International Trade Managment, Import
Export Procedures - PIMS, Lahore.
 (09/2019 - 10/2019)
 
Self-sponsored Diploma 
SKILLS 
Relationship Management 
Interpersonal Communication 
Strategy Development and Creative
Planning 
Brand Building & Strategy Enforcements 
Competitive Analysis and Trend
Identiﬁcation 
New Product and Packaging Ideas 
Marketing Research 
Market Entry Strategy 
Customer Acquisition 
PERSONAL PROJECTS 
Business Development Consultancy to a
US Based Client - Remotely
 (01/2022 - 03/2022)
 
Drafted Customer Persona and Acquisition Plan
for an eAective Customer Pipeline accumulation. 
Identiﬁed gaps in existing BD Plan, Brand Persona
and Online presence and suggested changes to be
incorporated. 
Suggested Email Marketing and LinkedIn
Campaign. 
Wrote procedure and scripts for Cold & Warm
Calls to prospects. 
Achievements/Tasks 
Achievements/Tasks 
Achievements/Tasks
input.additional_info: Preferred universities include National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences in Pakistan and equivalent institutions. We offer relocation support for candidates based outside of the hiring city, subject to management approval. Skills are assessed through a combination of technical tests, project management case studies, and panel interviews consisting of departmental heads and HR representatives.
minimum_requirements: Strong understanding of Agile and SCRUM methodologies
Master's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field
